content.headline: The 3 Most Undervalued Renewable Energy Stocks to Buy in December

content.headline: Top Stocks for December 2023
content.summary: The top stocks have the performance of well-run companies, a steady performance, and the potential for future growth.  In addition, top stocks turn over more shares and thus have plenty of liquidity to reduce your transaction costs.  Investors often compare top stocks against the Russell 3000 Index, a broad measure of the U.S. stock market comprising 3,000 large publicly traded companies or 96% of the investable U.S. equity market.
